-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Lenses for WAI
--   
--   Lenses for WAI
@package wai-lens
@version 0.1

module Network.Wai.Lens
class HasMethod s a | s -> a
method :: HasMethod s a => Lens' s a
class HasHttpVersion s a | s -> a
httpVersion :: HasHttpVersion s a => Lens' s a
class HasRawPathInfo s a | s -> a
rawPathInfo :: HasRawPathInfo s a => Lens' s a
class HasRawQueryString s a | s -> a
rawQueryString :: HasRawQueryString s a => Lens' s a
class HasHeaders s a | s -> a
headers :: HasHeaders s a => Lens' s a
class HasRemoteHost s a | s -> a
remoteHost :: HasRemoteHost s a => Lens' s a
class HasPathInfo s a | s -> a
pathInfo :: HasPathInfo s a => Lens' s a
class HasQueryString s a | s -> a
queryString :: HasQueryString s a => Lens' s a
class HasRequestBody s a | s -> a
requestBody :: HasRequestBody s a => Lens' s a
class HasVault s a | s -> a
vault :: HasVault s a => Lens' s a
class HasRequestBodyLength s a | s -> a
requestBodyLength :: HasRequestBodyLength s a => Lens' s a
class HasStatus s a | s -> a
status :: HasStatus s a => Lens' s a

-- | Useful for looking up query string or header values.
--   
--   <pre>
--   req ^. headers . value <a>Content-Type</a>
--   </pre>
value :: (Eq a, Foldable f) => a -> (b -> Const (First b) b) -> f (a, b) -> Const (First b) (f (a, b))
instance HasRequestBodyLength Request RequestBodyLength
instance HasVault Request Vault
instance HasRequestBody Request (IO ByteString)
instance HasQueryString Request Query
instance HasPathInfo Request [Text]
instance HasRemoteHost Request SockAddr
instance HasHeaders Request RequestHeaders
instance HasRawQueryString Request ByteString
instance HasRawPathInfo Request ByteString
instance HasHttpVersion Request HttpVersion
instance HasMethod Request Method
